content:
I wonder what made you
join this wave of migration?
As for me, someone told me...

content: Have you heard of the Revelare Academia?\nThe Academia conducts research into every field of knowledge imaginable - from zoology and botany to astronomy, geography, even phonograph records and literature!

Yeep... well, they're usually harmless.
Let's pretend we didn't see that.

content:

I encountered a most peculiar plant species,
luminescent, with such elegant hues.
